regen.absent_element: situation of handling project updates failure or errors
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle and notify users of any errors or failures that occur during batch project updates.

regen.absent_element: monitoring project budgets in case of budget exceedance or deviation
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the user when a project's budget exceeds or deviates from the allocated funding level.

regen.absent_element: situation of handling project updates failure or errors
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle and notify users of batch project update failures or errors, providing detailed error messages for corrective actions.

label: The system shall warn users if the project budget exceeds funding.
